name: Salesforce REST Collection Builder
description: This collection will generate a Postman collection dynamically from the version and sObject API endpoints for Salesforce, producing a definition of the surface area of the API for each individual account.

requests.name: Build Collection
requests.description: Lists all of the available objects for an organization within a specific version of Salesforce.

requests.name: List All Versions
requests.description: Lists summary information about each Salesforce version currently available, including the version, label, and a link to each version's root.

requests.name: List All Objects For Version
requests.description: Lists all of the available objects for an organization within a specific version of Salesforce.
